install.commandDescription: install package to target org without prompt; wraps force:package:install

flags.apexcompile: compile all apex in the org and package, or only Apex in the package; unlocked packages only
flags.publishwait: number of minutes to wait for subscriber package version ID to become available in the target org
flags.package: ID (starts with 04t) or alias of the package version to install
flags.securitytype: security access type for the installed package (deprecation notice: The default --securitytype value will change from AllUsers to AdminsOnly in  v47.0 or later.)
flags.upgradetype: the upgrade type for the package installation; available only for unlocked packages
flags.wait: number of minutes to wait for installation status

install.commandDescription: install package dependencies to target org; given the packages have no password
